topic.title: Email Settings
topic.shortdesc: If you would like to send system alert or balance alarm with email, you need to configure email settings first.

body.p: Go to System System preferences Email Settings to configure the SMTP Settings for Email.

ul.li: E-mail Address: Email address used for sending alerts.
Password: Password of the email account.
SMTP Server: The IP address or hostname of SMTP server that will be used to send alert as email attachments.
Port: The port of the SMTP server.

li.uicontrol: Use SSL/TLS to send secure message to server
li.note: It must be enabled for Gmail and exchange server.
